p: CPE reduction assays were performed as described previously [ 43]. Briefly, RD cells in 96-well cell culture plates were seeded, after which serials of diluted compounds and EV-A71 inoculum were added. CPE was quantified by MTS assay at 3 days post infection and expressed as percentage of untreated controls. The 50% effective concentration (EC 50) was calculated by logarithmic interpolation and is defined as the concentration at which the virus-induced CPE is reduced by 50%.
